issues.description: Module chain ends with a call to .directive() without parameters, which will throw a runtime exception.
Group membership check uses _.any(ticket.group.members, user._id); Lodash will treat user._id as a callback and always return false, preventing legitimate access.
After calling handleError, execution continues and may send multiple responses when an error occurs.
Variable declaration uses a semicolon before winston, leaving winston undefined and creating a global variable.
Template references /uploads/users/defaultprofile.jpg but the file added is defaultProfile.jpg (case mismatch).
Image upload form posts to /account/uploadimage, but the route is /accounts/uploadimage, causing a 404.
The uploadImage endpoint allows any authenticated user to upload files for any account without permission checks.
The users.single endpoint returns the entire user object, exposing hashed passwords via the API.
